thread.title: After Kellyanne Conway Publicly Promotes Ivanka Trump’s Clothing Line, Look What Happens to Her…
thread.title_full: After Kellyanne Conway Publicly Promotes Ivanka Trump’s Clothing Line, Look What Happens to Her…

author: John S. Roberts
title: After Kellyanne Conway Publicly Promotes Ivanka Trump’s Clothing Line, Look What Happens to Her…
text:
07:32pm February 9, 2017 Do you like this article? 
It’s not just Democrats and the mainstream media that are fed-up with Kellyanne Conway, Counselor to President Trump. 
Never Trumpers in Congress on the Republican side are now calling for Conway to be disciplined after she went on air and possibly violated federal ethics laws by promoting Ivanka Trump’s brands. 
More… 
From The Hill : 
In a letter to OGE Director Walter Shaub Jr., Chairman Jason Chaffetz (R-Utah) and ranking democrat Elijah Cummings (Md.) said Conway’s comments appeared to be an example of the White House counselor using her government office to endorse the personal business of President Trump’s daughter. 
Conway provoked controversy earlier Thursday when, in a Fox News appearance, she urged viewers to “go buy Ivanka’s stuff” in response to retailer Nordstrom dropping the clothing after citing poor sales. Conway called her comments a “free commercial.” 
Was Kellyanne wrong?
